clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Betaferon Adherence in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis Treated With Interferon Beta-1b
clinical_study.official_title: Cross-sectional Retrospective Study of Therapeutic Compliance in Patients With Multiple Sclerosis Treated With Interferon Beta-1b

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the adherence to the treatment with interferon beta-1b, in patients diagnosed with isolated syndrome (CIS), relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis (RRMS), or secondary progressive multiple sclerosis (SPMS) who had more than 6 months in treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Self-reported adherence to INFb-1b in the previous four weeks assessed by Morisky-Green (MG) test
primary_outcome.time_frame: Four weeks just before baseline visit

secondary_outcome.description: Age, sex, marital status, education level, employment status

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with MS diagnosis
Age at first episode and at diagnosis
Assessment of general health status using data from a questionnaire or from their clinical history collected by the investigator team
Expanded Disability Status Scale (EDSS) to assess the degree of disability caused by MS
secondary_outcome.description: The EDSS quantifies the disability in eight functional systems (FS) and allows neurologists to assign a level of Functional System in each of them caused by multiple sclerosis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events during the last month
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Four weeks just before baseline visit

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical setting characteristics like existence of MS unit
secondary_outcome.description: The existence of Multiple Sclerosis Unit was evaluated bearing in mind if the hospital had or had not available a Multiple Sclerosis Unit into the hospital Neurology Department.

arm_group.description: Patients with CIS, RRMS or SPMS who had more than 6 months in treatment

intervention.description: Interferon beta-1b (INFb-1b) was used at the standard dose of 250 mg/ml.

study_pop.textblock: This study included patients who had been on interferon beta-1b for more than 6 months and who agreed to participate in this study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with relapsing-remitting MS (RRMS), secondary progressive MS (SPMS) or patients with a first outbreak or clinically isolated syndrome (CIS) that carry more than 6 months in treatment with interferon beta-1b
Exclusion Criteria:
